data.title: RPG Boss Battle
data.solution:
### Solution for the problem
# Xana

hp_hero, hp_boss = [int(i) for i in input().split()] ## these are the max healths

max_hero = hp_hero ## diferenciate current health and max one
max_boss = hp_boss

n = int(input()) ## number of turns (they can be more)

for i in range(n):
    act_hero, act_boss = input().split()
    ## Checks if the boss heals, first priority in combat
    if "H" in act_boss:
        hp_boss+=int(act_boss[1:])
        if hp_boss>max_boss: ## there's a max health
            hp_boss=max_boss
    ## Now the Hero may attack or heal theyself
    if "H" in act_hero: ## same logic for hero healing
        hp_hero+=int(act_hero[1:])
        if hp_hero>max_hero:
            hp_hero=max_hero
    else:
        ## avariable actions for both the Hero and Boss are attack or heal, and because the
        ## Hero attacks first, we can use a else
        hp_boss-=int(act_hero[1:])
        ##check if killed
        if hp_boss <=0:
            print(f"HERO {hp_hero}") ## The Hero has defeated the Boss
            break
    if "D" in act_boss:
        hp_hero-=int(act_boss[1:])
        if hp_hero<=0:
            print(f"BOSS {hp_boss}") ## The hero has died
            break

You are programming a RPG game, and you have just finished the battle system, but you forgot to code the death trigger.

With the log of planned actions, you should output who will win the battle. Because it's a plan, there can be extra turns. A battle ends when [[hp]] <= 0. The current [[hp]] can't be greater than their max health
The Hero acts first, unless actBoss involves healing.

An example of a turn:
   D25 H12 --> [[actHero]] = attacks with 25 damage and [[actBoss]]= recovers 12 [[hpBoss]]

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You are programming a RPG game, and you have just finished the battle system, but you forgot to code the death trigger.

With the log of planned actions, you should output who will win the battle. Because it's a plan, there can be extra turns. A battle ends when hp <= 0. The current hp can't be greater than their max health
The Hero acts first, unless actBoss involves healing.

An example of a turn:
D25 H12 --> actHero = attacks with 25 damage and actBoss= recovers 12 hpBoss
Input
Line 1: hpHero hpBoss initial MAX health points for the Hero and Boss
Line 2: n lines for turns in battle
Next n Lines: actHero actBoss D for attack H for healing
Output
Who wins HERO or BOSS and its current hp
Constraints
10^6 >= hpHero >= 1
10^6 >= hpBoss >= 1
100 >= n >= 1
10^6 >= attack damage >= 0
10^6 >= healing amount >= 1
Example
Input
10 10
3
D3 D1
D3 D2
D4 D1
Output
HERO 7
